params.name: checkoutTemplateId
params.doc: ID of the checkout template to use to create a checkout.

params.name: siteId
params.doc: ID of the site associated with the checkout template.

docs.summary: Creates a new checkout based on the checkout template and redirects to the new checkout page.
description:
Before using this function, you must have a checkout template available. Create a checkout template with [`createCheckoutTemplate()`](#createcheckouttemplate).

To build a URL that uses this function, follow this format:
`https://www.wixapis.com/ecom/v1/checkout-templates/{checkoutTemplateId}/create-and-redirect-to-checkout?siteId={siteId}`

To create a checkout but not automatically redirect to the checkout page, use [`createCheckoutFromTemplate()`](#createcheckoutfromtemplate).

params.name: checkoutTemplateId
params.doc: ID of the checkout template to use to create a checkout from.

params.name: siteId
params.doc: ID of the site associated with the checkout template.

docs.summary: Creates a new checkout based on the checkout template.
description:
The customer can be directed to the new checkout using the checkout's `checkoutUrl`.

To create the new checkout and automatically redirect to the checkout page, use [Create and Redirect to Checkout](#createandredirecttocheckout).

A checkout template is used to create a new checkout that will include predefined information. For example, a single link with
a `checkoutTemplateId` can be shared with customers and each time the link is clicked, a new checkout page will be created
for that customer with certain checkout information already populated.

The customizable features include the option to allow or to lock coupon codes or gift cards. For example, if a store owner is
using the checkout template to offer a flash sale to their social media followers, they may want to lock the option to apply an
additional coupon on top of the sale being offered. If so, they can set `customization.applyCouponLocked` to `true`.

A checkout can be created with a checkout template in 2 ways:
- [`createAndRedirectToCheckout()`](#createandredirecttocheckout). With this function you can build a URL that when clicked will create a new checkout and redirect the customer to that new checkout page.
- [`createCheckoutFromTemplate()`](#createcheckoutfromtemplate). This function can be called to create a new checkout from the checkout template. You may add further customizations to the new checkout and then redirect the customer using the new checkout's `checkoutUrl`.

params.name: checkoutTemplateId
params.doc: ID of the checkout template to delete.

description:
If a checkout template is deleted and a customer attempts to create a checkout with that `checkoutTemplateId` then
the customer will be redirected to the domain site.

params.name: checkoutTemplateId
params.doc: ID of the checkout template to retrieve.

docs.summary: Creates a query to retrieve a list of checkout templates.
description: The `queryCheckoutTemplates()` function builds a query to retrieve a list of checkout templates and returns a [`CheckoutTemplatesQueryBuilder`](#checkouttemplatesquerybuilder) object.
The returned object contains the query definition, which is typically used to run the query using the [`find()`](#checkouttemplatesquerybuilder/find) function.

You can refine the query by chaining `CheckoutTemplatesQueryBuilder` functions onto the query. `CheckoutTemplatesQueryBuilder` functions enable you to sort, filter, and control the results that `queryCheckoutTemplates()` returns.
`queryCheckoutTemplates()` runs with the following `CheckoutTemplatesQueryBuilder` default that you can override:
+ `ascending("_id")`

The functions that are chained to `queryCheckoutTemplates()` are applied in the order they are called. For example, if you apply `ascending("status")` and then `ascending("_id")`, the results are sorted first by the `"status"`, and then, if there are multiple results with the same `"status"`, the items are sorted by `"_id"`.

The following `CheckoutTemplatesQueryBuilder` functions are supported for the `queryCheckoutTemplates()` function. For a full description of the checkout template object, see the object returned for the [`items`](#checkouttemplatesqueryresult/items) property in [`CheckoutTemplatesQueryResult`](#checkouttemplatesqueryresult).
|PROPERTY	|SUPPORTED FILTERS & SORTING

|`_id`|[`eq()`](wix-ecom-backend.CheckoutTemplates.CheckoutTemplatesQueryBuilder#eq),[`ne()`](wix-ecom-backend.CheckoutTemplates.CheckoutTemplatesQueryBuilder#ne),[`exists()`](wix-ecom-backend.CheckoutTemplates.CheckoutTemplatesQueryBuilder#exists),[`in()`](wix-ecom-backend.CheckoutTemplates.CheckoutTemplatesQueryBuilder#in),[`hasSome()`](wix-ecom-backend.CheckoutTemplates.CheckoutTemplatesQueryBuilder#hasSome),[`startsWith()`](wix-ecom-backend.CheckoutTemplates.CheckoutTemplatesQueryBuilder#startsWith),[`ascending()`](wix-ecom-backend.CheckoutTemplates.CheckoutTemplatesQueryBuilder#ascending),[`descending()`](wix-ecom-backend.CheckoutTemplates.CheckoutTemplatesQueryBuilder#descending)|

|`status`|[`eq()`](wix-ecom-backend.CheckoutTemplates.CheckoutTemplatesQueryBuilder#eq),[`ne()`](wix-ecom-backend.CheckoutTemplates.CheckoutTemplatesQueryBuilder#ne),[`exists()`](wix-ecom-backend.CheckoutTemplates.CheckoutTemplatesQueryBuilder#exists),[`in()`](wix-ecom-backend.CheckoutTemplates.CheckoutTemplatesQueryBuilder#in),[`hasSome()`](wix-ecom-backend.CheckoutTemplates.CheckoutTemplatesQueryBuilder#hasSome),[`ascending()`](wix-ecom-backend.CheckoutTemplates.CheckoutTemplatesQueryBuilder#ascending),[`descending()`](wix-ecom-backend.CheckoutTemplates.CheckoutTemplatesQueryBuilder#descending)|

If the info in a checkout template is updated, only new checkouts created from this template will include the updated items. Checkouts previously
created from this template before the update, will not be affected.

members.name: code
members.doc: Additional fee's unique code (or ID) for future processing.

members.name: lineItemIds
members.doc:
Optional - Line items associated with this additional fee.
If no `lineItemIds` are provided, the fee will be associated with the whole cart/checkout/order.

members.name: streetAddress

members.name: subdivision

description: Physical address

description: Billing Info and shipping details

members.name: aggregatedTaxAmount
members.doc: The sum of all the tax from line items that calculated by the tax identifiers.

members.name: jurisdictionName
members.doc: The name of the jurisdiction in which this tax detail applies.

members.name: jurisdictionType
members.doc: The type of the jurisdiction in which this tax detail applies (e.g. Country,State,County,City,Special).

members.name: taxName
members.doc: The name of the tax against which this tax amount was calculated.

members.name: taxRate
members.doc: The rate at which this tax detail was calculated, a number between 0.0 to 1.0.

members.name: taxType
members.doc: The type of tax that was calculated. Depends on the company's nexus settings as well as the jurisdiction's tax laws.

description:
The summary of the tax breakdown for all the line items. It will hold for each tax name, the aggregated tax amount paid for it and the tax rate.
Tax breakdown is the tax amount split to the tax authorities that applied on the line item.

members.name: appId
members.doc:
ID of the app providing the catalog. For items from Wix apps, the following values always apply:
+ Wix Stores: `"215238eb-22a5-4c36-9e7b-e7c08025e04e"`
+ Wix Bookings: `"13d21c63-b5ec-5912-8397-c3a5ddb27a97"`

members.name: catalogItemId
members.doc: ID of the item within its Wix or 3rd-party catalog. For example, `productId` for Wix Stores or `bookingId` for Wix Bookings.

members.name: options
members.doc:
Additional info in key:value pairs. For example, to specify Wix Stores product options or variants:
+ `{"options": {"options": {"Size": "M", "Color": "Red"}}}`
+ `{"options": {"variantId": "<VARIANT_ID>"}}`

description: Used for grouping line items and is sent on add to cart

members.name: _createdDate
members.doc: Date and time the checkout was created.

members.doc: Checkout ID.

members.name: _updatedDate
members.doc: Date and time the checkout was updated.

members.name: additionalFees
members.doc: Additional Fees.

members.name: appliedDiscounts
members.doc: Applied discounts.

members.name: billingInfo
members.doc: Billing information.

members.name: buyerInfo
members.doc: Buyer information.

members.name: buyerLanguage
members.doc:
Language for communication with the buyer. Defaults to the site language.
For a site that supports multiple languages, this is the language the buyer selected.

members.name: buyerNote
members.doc: [Buyer note](https://support.wix.com/en/article/wix-stores-viewing-buyer-notes) left by the customer.

members.name: calculationErrors
members.doc: Errors when calculating totals.

members.name: cartId
members.doc: Cart ID that this checkout was created from. Empty if this checkout wasn't created from a cart.

members.name: channelType
members.doc:
Sales channel that submitted the order.
+ `"UNSPECIFIED"`: Unspecified sales channel. This value is not supported.
+ `"WEB"`: A web client.
+ `"POS"`: [Point of sale solutions](https://support.wix.com/en/wix-mobile-pos-2196395)
+ `"EBAY"`: [eBay](https://support.wix.com/en/article/wix-stores-connecting-and-setting-up-an-ebay-shop)
+ `"AMAZON"`: [Amazon](https://support.wix.com/en/article/wix-stores-connecting-and-setting-up-an-amazon-shop)
+ `"WISH"`: [Wish](https://support.wix.com/en/article/wix-stores-connecting-and-setting-up-a-wish-shop)
+ `"WIX_INVOICES"`: Wix Invoices app in [your dashboard](https://www.wix.com/my-account/site-selector/?buttonText=Select%20Site&title=Select%20a%20Site&autoSelectOnSingleSite=true&actionUrl=https:%2F%2Fwww.wix.com%2Fdashboard%2F%7B%7BmetaSiteId%7D%7D%2Finvoices/settings/general-settings)
+ `"WIX_APP_STORE"`: [Wix Owner app](https://support.wix.com/article/wix-owner-app-an-overview)
+ `"BACKOFFICE_MERCHANT"`: Wix merchant backoffice
+ `"OTHER_PLATFORM"`: Other sales platform.

members.name: completed
members.doc:
Whether an order was successfully created from this checkout.
For an order to be successful, it must be successfully paid for (unless the total is 0).

members.name: conversionCurrency
members.doc: All converted prices are displayed in this currency in three-letter [ISO-4217 alphabetic](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_4217#Active_codes) format.

members.name: createdBy
members.doc: ID of the checkout's initiator.

members.name: currency
members.doc: The currency used when submitting the order.

members.name: customFields
members.doc: Custom fields.

members.name: customSettings
members.doc:
Additional settings for customization of the checkout process.

Custom settings can only be set when [creating a checkout](https://dev.wix.com/docs/rest/api-reference/wix-e-commerce/checkout/create-checkout).

members.name: giftCard
members.doc:
Applied gift card details.

>**Note:** Gift cards are supported through the Wix UI, though the SPI is not currently available. Learn more about [Wix Gift Cards](https://support.wix.com/en/article/wix-stores-setting-up-wix-gift-cards).

members.name: lineItems
members.doc:
Line items.

Max: 300 items

members.name: membershipOptions
members.doc: Memberships to apply when creating the order.

members.name: payLater
members.doc: Remaining amount for the order to be fully paid.

members.name: payNow
members.doc: Minimal amount to pay in order to place the order.

members.name: priceSummary
members.doc: Calculated price summary for the checkout.

members.name: purchaseFlowId
members.doc: Persistent ID that correlates between the various eCommerce elements: cart, checkout, and order.

members.name: shippingInfo
members.doc: Shipping information.

members.name: siteLanguage
members.doc: Site language in which original values are shown.

members.name: taxIncludedInPrice
members.doc: Whether tax is included in line item prices.

members.name: taxSummary
members.doc: Tax summary.

members.name: violations
members.doc: List of validation violations raised by the [Validations SPI](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/wix-ecommerce/validations-integration-spi/introduction).

members.name: weightUnit
members.doc: Weight measurement unit - defaults to site's weight unit.

members.doc: checkout template

members.doc: newly created checkout

members.name: applyCouponLocked
members.doc:
Whether to lock the ability to apply or remove a coupon code.

Default: `false`

members.name: redeemGiftCardLocked
members.doc:
Whether to lock the ability to add or remove a gift card.

Default: `false`

members.name: webClient
members.doc: Web client customizations. Only apply to the standard Wix checkout page.

members.name: _id
members.doc: Checkout template ID.

members.name: couponCode
members.doc:
Coupon code.

Note that a checkout can only hold one `couponCode` at a time. If an additional `couponCode` is added, it will override the existing `couponCode`.
For additional information, see the [Coupons API](/wix-marketing-v2/coupons).

members.name: customization
members.doc: Custom settings to apply to the checkout page created from this template.

members.name: lineItems
members.doc:
Line items.

Max: 300 items

members.name: status
members.doc:
Status of the checkout template.

When `status` is `INACTIVE` checkouts will not be created with this template `id`. Instead, the function will redirect to the merchant site.

Default: `ACTIVE`

members.name: cursor
members.doc:
Pointer to the next or previous page in the list of results. </ br>

You can get the relevant cursor token
from the `pagingMetadata` object in the previous call's response.
Not relevant for the first request.

members.name: limit
members.doc: Number of items to load.

members.name: count
members.doc: Number of items returned in the response.

members.name: cursors
members.doc: Offset that was requested.

members.name: hasNext
members.doc:
Indicates if there are more results after the current page.
If `true`, another page of results can be retrieved.
If `false`, this is the last page.

members.name: cursorPaging
members.doc: Cursor token pointing to a page of results. Not used in the first request. Following requests use the cursor token and not `filter` or `sort`.

members.name: filter
sort
members.doc:
Sort object in the following format:
`[{"fieldName":"sortField1","order":"ASC"},{"fieldName":"sortField2","order":"DESC"}]`

members.name: cursorPaging
members.doc: Cursor token pointing to a page of results. Not used in the first request. Following requests use the cursor token and not `filter` or `sort`.

members.name: next
members.doc: Cursor pointing to next page in the list of results.

members.name: prev
members.doc: Cursor pointing to previous page in the list of results.

Custom line item price.

Must be a number or a decimal without symbols.

members.name: quantity

Custom line item quantity.

Min: `1`

members.name: taxGroupId

members.name: physicalProperties

Default: `false`

Whether to restrict the option to add or remove a gift card on the checkout page.

Default: `false`

members.name: namespaces
members.doc:
Extended field data. Each key corresponds to the namespace of the app that created the extended fields.
The value of each key is structured according to the schema defined when the extended fields were configured.

You can only access fields for which you have the appropriate permissions.

members.name: ruleName
members.doc: applicable when violated_rule=OTHER

members.doc:
Supported values:
- `'DECIMAL_GT'`

- `'DECIMAL_LT'`
- `'DECIMAL_LTE'`
- `'DECIMAL_MAX_SCALE'`

- `'MAX'`
- `'MAX_LENGTH'`
- `'MAX_SIZE'`
- `'MIN'`
- `'MIN_LENGTH'`
- `'MIN_SIZE'`
- `'ONE_OF_ALIGNMENT'`
- `'OTHER'`
- `'REQUIRED_FIELD'`
- `'VALIDATION'`

Item availability status.
+ `"NOT_FOUND"`: Item does not exist
+ `"NOT_AVAILABLE"`: Item not in stock

members.name: credits
members.doc: Optional - For a membership that has limited credits, information about credit usage.

members.name: expirationDate
members.doc: Optional - TMembership expiry date.

members.name: lineItemIds
members.doc: Line item IDs which are "paid" for by this membership.

members.name: name
members.doc: The name of this membership.

members.name: original
members.doc: The name of this membership

members.name: translated
members.doc: Optional - Translated name of this membership. Defaults to `original` when not provided.

members.name: eligibleMemberships
members.doc: Reserved for internal use.

members.name: invalidMemberships
members.doc: Reserved for internal use.

members.name: selectedMemberships
members.doc: Selected membership to apply to this checkout.

description: Reserved for internal use.

members.name: remaining
members.doc: How much credit remained for this membership

members.name: total
members.doc: How much credit this membership has in total

members.name: amount
members.doc: Discount value.

members.name: amount
members.doc: Amount.

members.name: convertedAmount
members.doc: Converted amount.

members.name: formattedAmount
members.doc: Amount formatted with currency symbol.

members.name: formattedConvertedAmount
members.doc: Converted amount formatted with currency symbol.

members.name: name
members.doc: Location on a checkout or a cart page where a general (other) violation will be displayed.

description: General (other) violation.

members.name: price
members.doc: Price of added cost.

members.name: type
members.doc: Type of additional cost.

members.name: shippable
members.doc: Whether this line item is shippable.

members.name: sku
members.doc: Stock-keeping unit. Learn more about [SKUs](https://www.wix.com/encyclopedia/definition/stock-keeping-unit-sku).

members.name: weight
members.doc: Line item weight. Measurement unit (KG or LB) is taken from `order.weightUnit`.

members.name: address
members.doc: Pickup address.

members.name: businessLocation
members.doc: Whether the pickup address is that of a business - this may effect tax calculation.

members.name: pickupMethod
members.doc: Pickup method

members.name: original
members.doc: Description line plain text value in site's default language.

members.name: translated
members.doc: Translated description line plain text value according to buyer language. Defaults to `original` when not provided.

members.name: original
members.doc: Required.** Original price description in site's default language.

members.name: translated
members.doc: Translated price description according to buyer language. Defaults to `original` when not provided.

members.name: additionalFees
members.doc: Total additional fees price before tax.

members.name: discount
members.doc: Total calculated discount value.

members.name: shipping
members.doc: Total shipping price, before discounts and before tax.

members.name: subtotal
members.doc: Subtotal of all line items, before discounts and before tax.

members.name: tax
members.doc: Total tax.

members.name: total
members.doc: Total price after discounts, gift cards, and tax.

members.name: original
members.doc:
__Required.__ Original item name in site's default language.
Min: 1 character
Max: 200 characters

members.name: translated
members.doc:
Optional. Translated item name according to buyer language. Defaults to `original` when not provided.
Min: 1 character
Max: 400 characters

members.name: query
members.doc: Query options.

members.name: checkoutTemplates
members.doc: Retrieved checkout templates.

members.name: pagingMetadata
members.doc: Paging metadata.

members.name: group
members.doc: Coupon scope's applied group (e.g., event or ticket in Wix Events)

members.name: namespace
members.doc: Scope namespace (Wix Stores, Wix Bookings, Wix Events, Wix Pricing Plans)

members.name: _id
members.doc: Media ID in media manager.

members.name: fileName
members.doc: Original file name.

members.name: fileType
members.doc: File type.

members.name: carrierId
members.doc: This carrier's unique ID

members.name: code
members.doc: Unique identifier of selected option. For example, "usps_std_overnight".

members.name: cost
members.doc: Shipping costs.

members.name: logistics
members.doc: Delivery logistics.

members.name: otherCharges
members.doc: Other charges

members.name: requestedShippingOption
members.doc: Were we able to find the requested shipping option, or otherwise we fallback to the default one (the first)

members.name: title
members.doc:
Title of the option, such as USPS Standard Overnight Delivery (in the requested locale).
For example, "Standard" or "First-Class Package International".

members.name: cost
members.doc: Price of added charge.

members.name: details
members.doc: Details of the charge, such as 'Full Coverage Insurance of up to 80% of value of shipment'.

members.name: type
members.doc: Type of additional cost.

members.name: price
members.doc: Shipping price before discount and before tax.

members.name: taxDetails
members.doc: Tax details.

members.name: totalDiscount
members.doc: Shipping discount before tax.

members.name: totalPriceAfterTax
members.doc: Total shipping price, after discount and after tax.

members.name: totalPriceBeforeTax
members.doc: Total price of shipping after discounts (when relevant), and before tax.

members.name: _id
members.doc: Membership ID.

members.name: appId
members.doc: ID of the app providing this payment option.

members.name: lineItemIds
members.doc: IDs of the line items this membership applies to.

members.name: memberships
members.doc: Selected memberships.

members.name: numberOfParticipants
members.doc: The number of people participating in this service. For example, the number of people attending the class or the number of people per hotel room.

members.name: scheduledDate
members.doc: Date and time the service is supposed to be provided in [ISO-8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601#Combined_date_and_time_representations) format. For example, the time of the class.

members.name: carrierServiceOptions
members.doc: All carrier options for this shipping rule.

members.name: region
members.doc: Shipping region. Based on the address provided.

members.name: selectedCarrierServiceOption
members.doc: Selected option out of the options allowed for the `region`.

members.name: shippingDestination
members.doc: Shipping address and contact details.

members.name: code
members.doc:
Unique code of provided shipping option like "usps_std_overnight".
For legacy calculators this would be the UUID of the option.

members.name: cost
members.doc: Sipping price information.

members.name: logistics
members.doc: Delivery logistics.

members.name: title
members.doc:
Title of the option, such as USPS Standard Overnight Delivery (in the requested locale).
For example, "Standard" or "First-Class Package International".

members.name: otherCharges
members.doc: Other costs such as insurance, handling & packaging for fragile items, etc.

members.name: price
members.doc: Shipping price.

members.name: _id
members.doc: Shipping region ID.

members.name: name
members.doc: Shipping region name.

members.name: fieldName
members.doc: Name of the field to sort by.

members.name: order
members.doc: Sort order.

members.name: name
members.doc: Street name.

members.name: number
members.doc: Street number.

members.name: description
members.doc: Subscription option description.

members.name: subscriptionSettings
members.doc: Subscription option settings.

members.name: title
members.doc: Subscription option title.

members.name: autoRenewal
members.doc: Whether subscription is renewed automatically at the end of each period.

members.name: billingCycles
members.doc: Number of billing cycles before subscription ends. Ignored if `autoRenewal: true`.

members.name: frequency
members.doc: Frequency of recurring payment.

members.name: lineItem
members.doc: Specific line item violation.

members.name: other
members.doc: General (other) violation.

members.name: _id
members.doc: ID of the line item containing the violation.

members.name: name
members.doc: Location on a checkout or a cart page where the specific line item violation will be displayed.

description: Specific line item violation.

members.name: lineItem
members.doc: Specific line item violation.

members.name: other
members.doc: General (other) violation.

members.name: autoTaxFallbackDetails
members.doc: Details of the fallback rate calculation.

members.name: manualRateReason
members.doc: Reason the manual calculation was used.

members.name: rateType
members.doc: Rate calculation type.

members.name: autoTaxFallbackDetails
members.doc: Details of the fallback rate calculation.

members.name: manualRateReason
members.doc: Reason the manual calculation was used.

members.name: name
members.doc: Name of tax against which the calculation was performed.

members.name: rate
members.doc: Rate at which this tax detail was calculated.

members.name: tax
members.doc: Amount of tax for this tax detail.

members.name: calculationDetails
members.doc: Tax calculator that was active when the order was created.

members.name: taxableAmount
members.doc: Amount for which tax is calculated, added from line items.

members.name: totalTax
members.doc: Calculated tax, added from line items.

members.name: original
members.doc: Subscription option name.

members.name: translated
members.doc: Translated subscription option name.

members.name: _id
members.doc: Checkout template ID.

members.name: couponCode
members.doc:
Coupon code.

Note that a checkout can only hold one `couponCode` at a time. If an additional `couponCode` is added, it will override the existing `couponCode`.
For additional information, see the [Coupons API](/wix-marketing-v2/coupons).

members.name: customization
members.doc: Custom settings to apply to the checkout page created from this template.

members.name: lineItems
members.doc:
Line items.

Max: 300 items

members.name: status
members.doc:
Status of the checkout template.

When `status` is `INACTIVE` checkouts will not be created with this template `id`. Instead, the function will redirect to the merchant site.

Default: `ACTIVE`

members.name: checkoutTemplate
members.doc: Checkout template info to update.

members.name: checkoutTemplate
members.doc: Updated checkout template.

members.name: _id
members.doc: Line item ID.

members.name: availability
members.doc: Item availability details.

members.name: catalogReference
members.doc: Catalog and item reference. Includes IDs for the item and the catalog it came from, as well as further optional info.

members.name: depositAmount
members.doc: Partial payment to be paid upfront during the checkout. Eligible for catalog items with `lineItem.paymentOption` type `DEPOSIT_ONLINE` only.

members.name: descriptionLines
members.doc: Line item description lines. Used for display purposes for the cart, checkout and order.

members.name: discount
members.doc: Discount for this line item's entire quantity.

members.name: fullPrice
members.doc: Item price **before** catalog-defined discount. Defaults to `price` when not provided.

members.name: itemType
members.doc: Item type. Either a preset type or custom.

members.name: lineItemPrice
members.doc: Total line item price **after** catalog-defined discount and line item discounts.

members.name: media
members.doc: Line item image details.

members.name: paymentOption
members.doc:
Type of selected payment option for current item. Defaults to `FULL_PAYMENT_ONLINE`.
+ `FULL_PAYMENT_ONLINE`: The entire payment for this item happens as part of the checkout.
+ `FULL_PAYMENT_OFFLINE`: The entire payment for this item happens after the checkout. For example, when using cash, check, or other offline payment methods.
+ `MEMBERSHIP`: Payment for this item is done by charging a membership. When this option is used, `lineItem.price.amount` is `0`.
+ `DEPOSIT_ONLINE`: Partial payment to be paid upfront during the checkout. Initial amount to be paid for each line item is defined by `lineItem.deposit`.
+ `MEMBERSHIP_OFFLINE`: Payment for this item can only be performed by using a membership and must be manually redeemed in the dashboard by the site owner. When this option is used, `lineItem.price.amount` is `0`.

members.name: physicalProperties
members.doc: Physical properties of the item. When relevant, contains information such as SKU, item weight, and shippability.

members.name: price
members.doc: Item price **after** catalog-defined discount and line item discounts.

members.name: priceBeforeDiscounts
members.doc: Item price **before** line item discounts and **after** catalog-defined discount. Defaults to `price` when not provided.

members.name: priceDescription
members.doc: Additional description for the price. For example, when price is 0 but additional details about the actual price are needed - "Starts at $67".

members.name: productName
members.doc:
Item name.
+ Stores - `product.name`
+ Bookings - `service.info.name`
+ Events - `ticket.name`

members.name: quantity
members.doc:
Item quantity.

Min: `"1"`
Max: `"100000"`

members.name: rootCatalogItemId
members.doc:
In cases where `catalogReference.catalogItemId` is NOT the actual catalog item ID, this field will return the true item's ID.
+ For example, for Wix Bookings, `catalogReference.catalogItemId` is the booking ID. Therefore this value is set to the service ID.
+ In most cases, this field has the same value as `catalogReference.catalogItemId`.
+ Used in membership validation.

members.name: serviceProperties
members.doc: Service properties. When relevant, this contains information such as date and number of participants.

members.name: taxDetails
members.doc: Tax details for this line item.

members.name: totalPriceAfterTax
members.doc: Total price after all discounts and tax.

members.name: totalPriceBeforeTax
members.doc: Total price after discounts, and before tax.

members.name: url
members.doc: URL to the item's page on the site.

members.name: _id
members.doc: Customer's tax ID.

members.name: type
members.doc:
Tax type.

Supported values:
+ `CPF`: for individual tax payers
+ `CNPJ`: for corporations

members.name: description
members.doc: Violation description. Can include rich text. Only HTTP or HTTPS links in the following format are allowed: `Click me`.

members.name: severity
members.doc: Severity of the violation. The violations are shown on the cart and checkout pages. A warning is displayed as yellow, and allows a site visitor to proceed with caution. An error is displayed as red, and doesn't allow a site visitor to proceed with the eCommerce flow.

members.name: target
members.doc: Target location on a checkout or cart page where the violation will be displayed.

members.name: continueShoppingHidden
members.doc:
Whether to disable the "Continue shopping" button.

Default: `false`
